title: How Google Apple Phones Will Become Robot Assistants
text:
How Google, Apple Phones Will Become Robot Assistants 
US News & World Report Saturday 24th October, 2015 
Google Now , for instance, can suggest reminders for people's daily lives and prompt them with information they need based on their routines and buying habits, sending messages that the flight they booked is delayed or that their favorite business is about to close. Google's voice-activated search app is also being taught to recognize images and sounds to
